SEARCH
Package business

Class Project

java.lang.Object
business.Project
public class Project extends Object
The Project class handles the saving, loading, and exporting of project data. It manages the creation and storage of various project components such as class diagrams and use case diagrams. The class also integrates with Data Access Object (DAO) classes for saving/loading data and image exporters for exporting diagram images in different formats.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor for initializing the Project with default DAOs.

  • Constructor Details

      public Project()

  • Method Details

    • saveCDProject

      public void saveCDProject(ArrayList<Class> classes, ArrayList<Association> associations, ArrayList<Comment> comments, JFrame ui)
      Saves the class diagram project by prompting the user for a project name and destination folder. The project data (classes, associations, comments) are saved in JSON format.
      Parameters:
      classes - List of classes in the class diagram.
      associations - List of associations in the class diagram.
      comments - List of comments in the class diagram.
      ui - The UI frame to interact with the user.

    • saveUCDProject

      public void saveUCDProject(ArrayList<Usecase> usecases, ArrayList<Actor> actors, ArrayList<UseCaseArrow> arrows, ArrayList<UCDSystem> systems, JFrame ui)
      Saves the use case diagram project by prompting the user for a project name and destination folder. The project data (usecases, actors, arrows, systems) are saved in JSON format.
      Parameters:
      usecases - List of use cases in the use case diagram.
      actors - List of actors in the use case diagram.
      arrows - List of arrows in the use case diagram.
      systems - List of systems in the use case diagram.
      ui - The UI frame to interact with the user.

    • generateUCDComponents

      public ArrayList<Component> generateUCDComponents(ArrayList<Usecase> usecases, ArrayList<Actor> actors, ArrayList<UseCaseArrow> arrows, ArrayList<UCDSystem> systems)
      Generates a list of components (usecases, actors, arrows, systems) for a use case diagram project.
      Parameters:
      usecases - List of use cases in the diagram.
      actors - List of actors in the diagram.
      arrows - List of arrows in the diagram.
      systems - List of systems in the diagram.
      Returns:
      A list of components for the use case diagram project.

    • generateCDComponents

      public ArrayList<Component> generateCDComponents(ArrayList<Class> classes, ArrayList<Association> associations, ArrayList<Comment> comments)
      Generates a list of components (classes, associations, comments) for a class diagram project.
      Parameters:
      classes - List of classes in the diagram.
      associations - List of associations in the diagram.
      comments - List of comments in the diagram.
      Returns:
      A list of components for the class diagram project.

    • loadProject

      public ArrayList<Component> loadProject(JFrame ui)
      Loads a project from a selected JSON file.
      Parameters:
      ui - The UI frame to interact with the user.
      Returns:
      A list of components loaded from the selected project file.

    • exportToPNG

      public void exportToPNG(String filePath, float width, float height, ClassDiagramUI ui) throws IOException
      Exports the class diagram UI to a PNG image.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path where the PNG image will be saved.
      width - The width of the exported image.
      height - The height of the exported image.
      ui - The class diagram UI to export.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during the export.

    • exportToJPEG

      Exports the class diagram UI to a JPEG image.
      Parameters:

      width - The width of the exported image.
      height - The height of the exported image.
      ui - The class diagram UI to export.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during the export.
